name: Beats Detection
description:
Detect the beats of the audio sourcen (mostly, musical audio) in realtime. Return the beats value in 1, 2, 3, 4 sequence.
It is normal to have 2 seconds accuracy delay.

inputs.name: Audio
inputs.description: The audio stream you want to detect the beats

outputs.name: Audio
outputs.description: Execute this node,  connect to a speaker to play the audio stream or connect to a Detection Output to finish the connect without play audio

outputs.name: Beat Value
outputs.description: Beats detection result, always return the beats value in 1, 2, 3, 4 sequence.
